name: Companion-Man
description:
*Sorry I Submitted So Early, I Wont Be In Town For The Rest Of This Week!*

Liluo Game: https://liluo.io/itsjetty/companion-man

This is my submission for my first ever game jam, Gdevelop-game-jam-2. I really hope you enjoy this game!

Companion-Man is a fun, challenging, addictive, platform game were you have to beat all of the levels, use your pet to pass levels, and much more! Will you be able to beat all levels? Good luck, and have fun!

How to play:

Forward: (right arrow) *use to move through the obstacles*

Backwards: (left arrow) *use to move backwards if you mess up or need more space*

*Made By JettyDev/ItsJetty*
